game.name: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!
game.shortDescriptionEn: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!
